actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to terminate construction of the Cross-Florida Barge Canal project effective July 1, 1979, to adjust the boundary of the Ocala National Forest, Florida, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Terminates the authorization for further construction of the Cross-Florida Barge Canal. Extends the boundaries of the Ocala National Forest, Florida, to include land owned by the United States as part of the Cross-Florida Barge Canal project. Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to acquire lands owned by the State of Florida within the extended boundaries of the Forest.

titles.title: A bill to terminate construction of the Cross-Florida Barge Canal project effective July 1, 1979, to adjust the boundary of the Ocala National Forest, Florida, and for other purposes.
